extension.name: Content - Janrain Engage
extension.author: Jeremy Bradbury
extension.description: A plugin for Janrain Engage social registration, authentication & sharing service.

field.name: auth_auto
field.label: Auto Registration
field.description: Autmatically registers and authenticates users for most providers. Redirects to registration form when disabled or for providers that do not support this feature. Supporting providers: Facebook, Google, Paypal, Yahoo!, Windows Live, Salesforce, Foursquare, Flickr, Hyves, MyOpenID, Verisign, VZ-Netzwerke, Wordpress.

field.name: auth_btn
field.label: Generate Buttons
field.description: Autmatically place the Social Login Buttons. Nowhere: Use this to build your own buttons and place them in the template. In Module: Places the Buttons into a Login Module. First create the Module then enter it's ID below. In Content: Use {janrainengage auth} in any 'Articles', where you would like the buttons to appear. NOTE: In Content buttons show even when user is logged in and only one allowed per page.

field.name: auth_size
field.label: Button Size
field.description: Choose your Social Sign-In Icon Size.

field.name: auth_title
field.label: Login Module Title
field.description: This is the Title of the Login Module you would like your Social Sign-in Buttons to appear.

field.name: auth_loc
field.label: Button Placement
field.description: The buttons will be inserted into the Login Form's 'Pre-Text' or 'Post-Text' fields.

field.name: share_btn
field.label: Generate Buttons
field.description: Autmatically place the Social Sharing Buttons. Use {janrainengage share} in a 'Custom HTML' Module with 'Prepare Content' set to yes or any 'Articles', where you would like the buttons to appear. Note: Only one per page, any subsequent buttons will be not function.

field.name: share_msg
field.default: Check out this article I found:
field.label: Share Message
field.description: This text appears in the message portion of the sharing widget and works as a suggested prefix for the user to share.

field.name: @auto
field.label: Auto-Populated Settings
field.description: The following fields will be auto-populated when you 'Save and Close' this form after entering your API key above.

field.name: refresh
field.label: Update Settings
field.description: If this is set to Refresh then the settings below will be updated upon 'save and close'. Note: if you only hit save the settings will not be visible until you close and return (or refresh the page).

field.name: appid
field.label: App ID
field.description: Your Janrain Engage App ID. This field will be auto-populated.

field.name: app_alias
field.label: App Alias
field.description: Your Janrain Engage App Alias. This field will be auto-populated.

field.name: realm
field.label: Realm
field.description: The realm of your Janrain Engage app. This field will be auto-populated.

field.name: realmscheme
field.label: Realm Scheme
field.description: The realm scheme of your Janrain Engage app. This field will be auto-populated.

field.name: adminurl
field.label: Admin URL
field.description: The Admin URL of your Janrain Engage app. This field will be auto-populated.

field.name: socialpub
field.label: Social Sharing Providers
field.description: The enabled social sharing providers for this app. This field will be auto-populated.

field.name: providers
field.label: Social Sign-in Providers
field.description: The enabled authentication providers for this app. This field will be auto-populated.
